casebody.data:
IN RE: C.J. 159A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 11, 2019

J. Lee Gilliam, Assistant Parent Defender.

Richard Allen Penley, Attorney at Law.

Michelle F. Lynch, GAL Appellate Counsel.

Wendy C. Sotolongo, Parent Defender.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Reply Brief filed on the 11th of July 2019 by Respondent-Mother:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of July 2019."

Respondent-Mother shall have up to and including the 5th day of August 2019 to file and serve his/ her brief with this Court.
